results.title: The Aviator
results.headline_credit: Germany and United States of America, 2004
results.brief_description: A biopic charting the life of filmmaker and aviation magnate Howard Hughes between 1927 and 47, when his meteoric rise was impacted by his severe obsessive-compulsive disorder. Directed by Scorsese, digitally emulated the look of Technicolor to reflect the film’s era.

constellations_other.name: Wearing the pants, ladies who lead
constellations_other.description: The pre-code 1932 feature, A Bill of Divorcement, a glass cinema slide of which features in the glass cinema slide display, stars John Barrymore and Katharine Hepburn in her screen debut.

constellations_other.name: Over the Technicolor rainbow
constellations_other.description: This Constellation explores the beginning and legacy of Technicolor and was created by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies students Adam Virgona and Kristian Vass.

constellations_other.name: Communicating colour
constellations_other.description: An exploration of colour on-screen inspired by Technicolor supervisor, Natalie Kalmus.

constellations_other.name: Movies in movies in a movie museum
constellations_other.description: The 400 Porto-Arc 16mm projector used the first electric light ever invented, which was perfectly suited for movie projectors. This Constellation explores the movies where characters go to the movies, by two movie-obsessed directors.

results.description: A biopic depicting the life of filmmaker and aviation pioneer Howard Hughes from 1927 to 1947, during which time he became a successful film producer and an aviation magnate, while simultaneously growing more unstable due to severe obsessive-compulsive disorder.
description_for_label: A biopic depicting the life of filmmaker and aviation pioneer Howard Hughes from 1927 to 1947, during which time he became a successful film producer and an aviation magnate, while simultaneously growing more unstable due to severe obsessive-compulsive disorder.

creators_other.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 3. Produktions KG

results.title: The Avengers
results.brief_description: When an unexpected enemy emerges and threatens global safety and security, Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster. Spanning the globe, a daring recruitment effort begins!
results.description: When an unexpected enemy emerges and threatens global safety and security, Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster. Spanning the globe, a daring recruitment effort begins!
description_for_label: When an unexpected enemy emerges and threatens global safety and security, Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster. Spanning the globe, a daring recruitment effort begins!

results.title: The Australian Dream
results.brief_description: The Australian Dream is a theatrical feature documentary that uses the remarkable and inspirational story of AFL legend Adam Goodes as the prism through which to tell a deeper and more powerful story about race, identity and belonging.

constellations_other.name: Culture and identity on the Australian screen
constellations_other.description: Australian screen culture is distinctive, unexpected, playful and serious when it matters. Indigenous productions make a huge contribution to the unique identity of the Australian moving image.

results.title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
results.creator_credit: David Valdes, Brad Pitt, Ridley Scott, Dede Gardner, Andrew Dominik, Jules Daly, Plan B Entertainment, Virtual Studios, Scott Free Productions, Alberta Film Entertainment, Jesse Films Inc. and Warner Bros. Pictures
results.headline_credit: Canada, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2007
results.brief_description: Outlaw Jesse James is rumored to be the ‘fastest gun in the West’. An eager recruit into James’ notorious gang, Robert Ford eventually grows jealous of the famed outlaw and, when Robert and his brother sense an opportunity to kill James, their murderous action elevates their target to near mythical status.

constellations_other.name: Eric Bana
constellations_other.description: There must be something that draws Australian creatives like Eric Bana to darker material as they shoot to stardom overseas. Australia's penal colony past perhaps?

results.title_for_label: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
results.creator_credit_for_label: David Valdes, Brad Pitt, Ridley Scott, Dede Gardner, Andrew Dominik, Jules Daly, Plan B Entertainment, Virtual Studios, Scott Free Productions, Alberta Film Entertainment, Jesse Films Inc. and Warner Bros. Pictures
results.headline_credit_for_label: Canada, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2007

An eager recruit into James’ notorious gang, Robert Ford eventually grows jealous of the famed outlaw and, when Robert and his brother sense an opportunity to kill James, their murderous action elevates their target to near mythical status.

results.title: The Artist
results.brief_description: Hollywood, 1927: as silent movie star George Valentin wonders if the arrival of talking pictures will cause him to fade into oblivion, he sparks with Peppy Miller, a young dancer set for a big break.

constellations_other.name: Using the silent film aesthetic
constellations_other.description: Explore how contemporary filmmakers use visual references to the silent era to convey information to a film literate audience.

constellations_other.name: Boom mics, Clara Bow and musicals
constellations_other.description: The microphone was called the "terror of the studios" when sound films were introduced in the late 1920s, but after initial resistance Hollywood fully embraced the new technology.

results.description: The Artist is a 2011 French comedy-drama film in the style of a black-and-white silent film or part-talkie. Written, directed, and co-edited by Michel Hazanavicius, and produced by Thomas Langmann, the film stars Jean Dujardin and Bérénice Bejo.
description_for_label: The Artist is a 2011 French comedy-drama film in the style of a black-and-white silent film or part-talkie. Written, directed, and co-edited by Michel Hazanavicius, and produced by Thomas Langmann, the film stars Jean Dujardin and Bérénice Bejo.

results.title: The Arrival of a Train at La Ciotat
results.brief_description: The Lumière brothers’ famous actuality film of people waiting for a train to arrive at La Ciotat.

constellations_other.name: The Lumière brothers
constellations_other.description: The Lumière brothers understood the potential of cinema to be exhibited theatrically. Only one person could watch films through Thomas Edison's Kinetograph, while Auguste and Louis exhibited their films to thousands with Cinematographe.

constellations_other.name: New ways of seeing
constellations_other.description: The 3D worlds presented through the stereoscopic viewer are part of an ongoing fascination with immersive imagery.

results.title_for_label: The Arrival of a Train at La Ciotat
results.description: A group of people are standing along the platform of a railway station in La Ciotat, waiting for a train. One is seen coming, at some distance, and eventually stops at the platform. Doors of the railway-cars open and attendants help passengers off and on. Popular legend has it that, when this film was shown, the first-night audience fled the café in terror, fearing being run over by the “approaching” train. This legend has since been identified as promotional embellishment, though there is evidence to suggest that people were astounded at the capabilities of the Lumières’ cinématographe.
description_for_label: A group of people are standing along the platform of a railway station in La Ciotat, waiting for a train. One is seen coming, at some distance, and eventually stops at the platform. Doors of the railway-cars open and attendants help passengers off and on. Popular legend has it that, when this film was shown, the first-night audience fled the café in terror, fearing being run over by the “approaching” train. This legend has since been identified as promotional embellishment, though there is evidence to suggest that people were astounded at the capabilities of the Lumières’ cinématographe.

results.title: The Aristocats
results.creator_credit: Frank Thomas, Eric Cleworth, Julius Svendsen, Winston Hibler, Ralph Wright, Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Animation Studios, Wolfgang Reitherman, Larry Clemmons, Ken Anderson and Vance Gerry
results.brief_description: When Madame Adelaide Bonfamille leaves her fortune to Duchess and her children—Bonfamille’s beloved family of cats—the butler plots to steal the money and kidnaps the legatees, leaving them out on a country road. All seems lost until the wily Thomas O’Malley Cat and his jazz-playing alley cats come to the aristocats’ rescue.

constellations_other.name: Raising the Roof: on-screen levity on rooftop
constellations_other.description: Performances soar to new heights on the rooftop, not only showcasing skylines but also creating electrifying drama, comedy and spectacle.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Frank Thomas, Eric Cleworth, Julius Svendsen, Winston Hibler, Ralph Wright, Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Animation Studios, Wolfgang Reitherman, Larry Clemmons, Ken Anderson and Vance Gerry
results.description: When Madame Adelaide Bonfamille leaves her fortune to Duchess and her children—Bonfamille’s beloved family of cats—the butler plots to steal the money and kidnaps the legatees, leaving them out on a country road. All seems lost until the wily Thomas O’Malley Cat and his jazz-playing alley cats come to the aristocats’ rescue.
description_for_label: When Madame Adelaide Bonfamille leaves her fortune to Duchess and her children—Bonfamille’s beloved family of cats—the butler plots to steal the money and kidnaps the legatees, leaving them out on a country road. results.title: The Andromeda Strain
results.brief_description: When virtually all of the residents of Piedmont, New Mexico, are found dead after the return to Earth of a space satellite, the head of the US Air Force’s Project Scoop declares an emergency. A group of eminent scientists led by Dr. Jeremy Stone scramble to a secure laboratory and try to first isolate the life form while determining why two people from Piedmont - an old alcoholic and a six-month-old baby - survived. The scientists methodically study the alien life form unaware that it has already mutated and presents a far greater danger in the lab, which is equipped with a nuclear self-destruct device designed to prevent the escape of dangerous biological agents..

results.title: The Americans
results.creator_credit: DreamWorks Television, David Woods, Dan Davis and Katie Irish
results.brief_description: Set during the Cold War period in the 1980s, The Americans is the story of Elizabeth and Philip Jennings, two Soviet KGB officers posing as an American married couple in the suburbs of Washington D.C. and their neighbor, Stan Beeman, an FBI Counterintelligence agent.

constellations_other.name: My Hometown: Archives woven into new narrative
constellations_other.description: Offering viewers a snapshot of life on the road for an Australian touring band in the 1960s, 'My Hometown', directed by Sari Braithwaite was developed reimagining archival 8mm footage shot by drummer Leon Isackson.

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

results.creator_credit_for_label: DreamWorks Television, David Woods, Dan Davis and Katie Irish
results.description: Set during the Cold War period in the 1980s, The Americans is the story of Elizabeth and Philip Jennings, two Soviet KGB officers posing as an American married couple in the suburbs of Washington D.C. and their neighbor, Stan Beeman, an FBI Counterintelligence agent.

results.title: The American Astronaut
results.brief_description: Samual Curtis’s first mission in this bizarre science fiction musical comedy requires him to take a cat to a saloon on an asteroid. There, he meets his former dance partner (the Blueberry Pirate) and collects his payment: a device capable of producing a Real Live Girl. Including music by alternative rock group The Billy Nayer Show, this film began life as a live show with a loyal following.
